title: Omicron Curbs (with Stephen Crabb MP)
itunes:title: Omicron Curbs (with Stephen Crabb MP)
description:
Stephen Crabb, Conservative MP and former Secretary of State for Work and Pensions, says he and other backbenchers have confidence in the Health Secretary Sajid Javid's measures against the omicron variant. He also tells Bloomberg's Yuan Potts and Caroline Hepker that the government hasn't found a way to properly address the migrant problems at the English Channel.

Plus Bloomberg Intelligence's Sam Fazeli says England should have enforced mask wearing months ago and should have tested all arrivals from South Africa as soon as the new variant was discovered.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
